name: Screwbolt
description:
A mysterious sky ship has landed on Blickbit Isle, an oddly charming army of robots has appeared, and all your beloved fairy friends have vanished! The daring tinkerer Tuli will need to jump, ground-pound and dash-attack her way to victory in an adorable 2D platformer!

Features:
  • Use your nifty screwdriver to dash and bash blocks and baddies, and traverse obstacles
  • Charming 2D graphics
  • 2-player co-op
  • Memorable music
  • Cute (and evil!?) bunnies
General Game Info
  • A 2nd controller must be plugged in for Player 2 to appear
  • Due to the short nature of this first build, data will not be saved
  • Audio output (i.e. headphones to speakers, etc.) cannot be switched while playing.
